ai-kv18.2:1.4_0: For what reason do you take?”
ai-kv18.2:1.6_0: I will be satisfied, the joyful and fully awakened. Let them know the goal of the Dhamma.”
ai-kv18.2:1.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.2:2.4_0: For what reason do you take?”
ai-kv18.2:2.6_0: Venerable Ānanda, the teacher is the one who knows and sees, the fully awakened Buddha: “I will show the Truth, the Dhamma, and the Sangha of all people.”
ai-kv18.2:2.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.2:3.7_0: maybe both in brief and in detail.
ai-kv18.2:3.8_0: But it’s hard to find anyone who understands.”
ai-kv18.2:3.11_0: for this is the Teaching of the Buddha.”
ai-kv18.2:4.5_0: “I have deep understanding, mendicants, I teach the Dhamma for myself, not without wisdom.
ai-kv18.2:4.6_0: I teach with reasons, not without them.
ai-kv18.2:4.7_0: I teach the miraculous Teaching, not without a demonstration.
ai-kv18.2:4.8_0: Since this is so, you should follow my advice and instruction.
ai-kv18.2:4.9_0: This is enough for you to feel joyful, delighted, and happy:
ai-kv18.2:4.10_0: “The Blessed One is a fully awakened Buddha! The teaching is well explained! The Saṅgha is practicing well!”’
ai-kv18.2:4.11_0: And while this discourse was being spoken, the galaxy shook.”
ai-kv18.2:4.14_0: for this is the Teaching of the Buddha.”
